cause.description:
Join in in signing the largest ever global warming petition with over 350,000 signitures already, through avaaz.org. An organisation with real influence on world leaders, and dedication in making our voices heard.
link: http://www.avaaz.org/en/climate_g8/tf.php

cause.mission: to put amounting pressure on world leaders to promote change
cause.name: Petition Against Global Warming
